# graphemeCluster

**Type Property**

Match at the character level.

## Declaration

```swift
static var graphemeCluster: RegexSemanticLevel { get }
```

## Discussion

At this semantic level, each matched element is a `Character` value. This is the default semantic level.
title: graphemeCluster
